experience.title: HR Executive
experience.description: 	Offer Letter 	Appointment Letter	All Transfer letter process Department, Location, Company Transfer.	Process the Re-Designation Letter, Promotion Letter, Salary revised/Restructure letter, Deputation letter, Internship letter, Bonus letter & Retirement letter.	Salary input given to payroll team.	Myht updation.	Manage the employee’s files, documents and Letters.	Solving the branch office’s queries through phone & mails.	Convey employee’s data to the internal Team HR.	Notice period given to payroll team.	Joining Status of Employees form internal Team HR	Maintain Retention Bonus Letter Tracker, Joining Bonus Tracker, Letter Tracker.	Attendance process.	HR Help Desk (Query Related Leaves, attendance, policy, Id cards) 	Employees Confirmations  Letter	Employees Services Contract Renewables	Joining Formalities	Welcome Mail/ Letter for New Joinee	ID Process for New Joinee
experience.description_html:  Offer Letter  Appointment Letter All Transfer letter process Department, Location, Company Transfer. Process the Re-Designation Letter, Promotion Letter, Salary revised/Restructure letter, Deputation letter, Internship letter, Bonus letter & Retirement letter. Salary input given to payroll team. Myht updation. Manage the employee’s files, documents and Letters. Solving the branch office’s queries through phone & mails. Convey employee’s data to the internal Team HR. Notice period given to payroll team. Joining Status of Employees form internal Team HR Maintain Retention Bonus Letter Tracker, Joining Bonus Tracker, Letter Tracker. Attendance process. HR Help Desk (Query Related Leaves, attendance, policy, Id cards)  Employees Confirmations Letter Employees Services Contract Renewables Joining Formalities Welcome Mail/ Letter for New Joinee ID Process for New Joinee
